簡.definition: simple; uncomplicated; letter; to choose; to select; bamboo strips used for writing (old)

簡·愛.definition: Jane Eyre, novel by Charlotte Brontë 夏洛特·勃良特[Xia4 luo4 te4 · Bo2 liang2 te4]

簡中.definition: Simplified Chinese (abbr. for 簡體中文|简体中文[jian3ti3 Zhong1wen2])

簡冊.definition: booklet; brochure; (old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)

簡單地說.definition: to put it simply; simply put

簡單明瞭.definition: clear and simple; in simple terms

簡單網絡管理協議.pinyin: jiǎn dān wǎng luò guǎn lǐ xié yì

簡報.definition: presentation; briefing; (oral or written) brief report

簡寫.definition: to write characters in simplified form; the simplified form of a character; to abbreviate (a word or expression); to write in simple language

簡拼.definition: (computing) input method where the user types just the initial or first letter of each syllable, e.g. "shq" or "sq" for 事情[shi4qing5]

簡明扼要.definition: brief and to the point (idiom); succinct

簡易爆炸裝置.pinyin: jiǎn yì bào zhà zhuāng zhì

簡氏防務週刊.pinyin: jiǎn shì fáng wù zhōu kān

簡煉.definition: variant of 簡練|简练[jian3 lian4]

簡牘.definition: bamboo and wooden slips (used for writing on in ancient times); letter; correspondence; book; document

簡省.definition: to simplify; to reduce to essentials; economical

簡稱.definition: to be abbreviated to; abbreviation; short form

簡章.definition: concise list of rules; brochure; pamphlet

簡繁轉換.definition: conversion from simple to traditional Chinese characters

簡而言之.definition: in a nutshell; to put it briefly

簡表.definition: table (displaying data in rows and columns)

簡裝.definition: paperback; plainly packaged; opposite: 精裝|精装[jing1 zhuang1]

簡言之.definition: in simple terms; to put things simply; briefly

簡訊.definition: newsletter; the news in brief; (Tw) SMS message

簡諧.definition: simple harmonic (motion, oscillation etc in mechanics)

簡諧運動.definition: simple harmonic motion (in mechanics); motion of a simple pendulum

簡譜.definition: music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7

簡述.definition: to outline; to summarize; to sketch; summary; brief description; concise narrative; in a nutshell; briefly

簡陽.definition: see 簡陽市|简阳市[Jian3yang2 Shi4]

簡陽市.definition: Jianyang, county-level city in Ziyang 資陽市|资阳市[Zi1yang2 Shi4], Sichuan

簡體.definition: simplified form of Chinese characters, as opposed to traditional form 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3]

簡體字.definition: simplified Chinese character, as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fan2 ti3 zi4]
